Over a millennium before the arrival of pyramids in Iran Peru and Egypt the megalithic building traditions invented the [Kurgan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurgan) burial mound around the Black Sea.  

Kurgans later appeared in Greece in the form of [Tholoi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beehive_tomb)
